abstract: Greece is broke, and its government is looking to raise taxes on businesses to generate revenue; latest proposal to creditors is drawing initial support from European officials, but some pushback from companies is occurring; nation faces crucial debt payment.
lead_paragraph: With Greece virtually broke, the government is looking to raise taxes on businesses to fill its financial gap.

headline.main: Businesses Worry About Shouldering Burden of Greek Debt

snippet: With Greece virtually broke, the government is looking to raise taxes on businesses to fill its financial gap.
